entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
